definition: to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body
Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region
pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 fu3 Zhu4 Xiang1 gang3 Te4 bie2 Xing2 zheng4 qu1 Lian2 luo4 Ban4 gong1 shi4
containing_words.word: 中央人民政府駐香港特別行政區聯絡辦公室

definition: CCP central committee's external affairs department (i.e. Chinese communist party's foreign office)

sentences.english: The BLOs provide short-term shelter and can provide medical care.
sentences.chinese: 這些邊境聯絡處提供短期的庇護和醫療。

sentences.english: Communicate with orphanage directors and hospital staff.
sentences.chinese: 與兒童福利院院長及醫院職員聯絡。

sentences.english: VSO will obtain your consent before contacting referees.
sentences.chinese: 在聯絡你的聯繫人之前我們會徵得你的同意。

sentences.english: Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted for further assessment.
sentences.chinese: 本局只會聯絡初步入選的申請人作進一步評覈。

sentences.english: Do not meet does not mean not miss, do not contact just to cover up nostalgic.
sentences.chinese: 䇓翱不見面不等於不思念，不聯絡只是爲了掩飾眷戀。

sentences.english: She instructed me in the use of the telephone.
sentences.chinese: 我用電話跟他聯絡會更簡單。

sentences.english: At times, their communication would drop off, Mr. Jones said.
sentences.chinese: 有時候他們之間的聯絡會減少，瓊斯說。

sentences.english: And dismantle the stand or fall of a contact and the perhaps sex is great.
sentences.chinese: 而拆搭的好壞與和出的或許性聯絡甚大。

sentences.english: On the contrary, we should strengthen our ties with them.
sentences.chinese: 相反，我們還應增強和他們的聯絡。

sentences.english: Zhuo Wenxiang can't find Zhou Yuqin and Zhao Liang, decided to change the contact address.
sentences.chinese: 卓文祥找不到周玉琴和趙亮，決定更換聯絡站地址。

sentences.english: To obtain pricing information, please contact your local service representative.
sentences.chinese: 臺端如欲獲取價格資訊，請聯絡當地服務代表。

sentences.english: He asked for my help to contact and inform Daniel.
sentences.chinese: 他託我聯絡及告訴田聖。

sentences.english: Request that all communication be in writing.
sentences.chinese: 所有通信應以書面聯絡。

sentences.english: Marconi's radio greatly increased the speed of communications.
sentences.chinese: 無線電報的電波傳送極大地提高了通訊聯絡的速度。

sentences.english: According to the suppliers that can not use usually, make contact whiling arrange the supplier files.
sentences.chinese: 不經常使用的供應商應在整理檔案時進行聯絡溝通。

sentences.english: Objecive To investigate the effect of Consultation-Liaison Psychiatry(CLP)on the general hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討會診聯絡精神病學在綜合醫院的作用。

definition: connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
